summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Kenyon Street to Southwest Roxbury Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 19375 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode installment notes.
